content.description: Percentage of Children Diagnosed with ADHD
content.question: Which of the following is supported by the data in the provided map of ADHD diagnoses?

choices.label: States in western United States do not believe ADHD is an actual disorder.
States with higher population have higher percentages of diagnosed ADHD in children.
Children in the Northwest of the United States are diagnosed at a higher rate than those of the Southeast.
Possible causes of ADHD may be related to environmental factors like geography.

content.answer: Possible causes of ADHD may be related to environmental factors like geography.

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 3.A: Identify psychology-related concepts in descriptions or representations of data.
